options.feedback: Proceeding without verification breaches policy.

options.label: Collect alternative documents like certified passports or driver licences
options.feedback: Correct - alternative documents support verification (page 5).

options.label: Delete the application and ask the adviser to start over
options.feedback: Restarting wastes time and is not required.

items.prompt: True or false: Digital identity steps vary by entity type, so confirm requirements early.

options.label: True
options.feedback: Correct - this statement is documented in the training guide.

options.label: False
options.feedback: The guide confirms this statement, so treat it as true.

quizzes.title: Condition of Release Governance Knowledge Check
quizzes.description: Ensure pension changes comply with condition of release rules, documentation, and audit trails.

items.prompt: What does the COR status Pending indicate?

options.label: Supporting documentation is outstanding or under review
options.feedback: Correct - Pending means evidence is still required (page 23).

options.label: Payments can proceed immediately
options.feedback: Pending prevents payment changes.

options.label: The client is exempt from COR rules
options.feedback: There is no exemption state.

options.label: The system has a bug
options.feedback: Pending reflects documentation state, not a bug.

items.prompt: Which records should be stored when COR transitions to Met?

options.label: Certified documents proving eligibility
options.feedback: Correct - documentation evidences compliance (page 23).

options.label: Agent personal notes only
options.feedback: Personal notes are insufficient.

options.label: Case notes summarising the change and follow up date
options.feedback: Correct - summarising the change keeps audits clear (page 23).

options.label: Marketing preferences
options.feedback: Marketing preferences are unrelated.

items.prompt: True or false: COR status governs every pension decision in Edge.

options.label: True
options.feedback: Correct - this statement is documented in the training guide.

options.label: False
options.feedback: The guide confirms this statement, so treat it as true.

flashcards.front: Edge Platform Architecture Foundations - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain why CFS Edge replaced the FirstWrap and FirstChoice stacks.

flashcards.front: Edge Platform Architecture Foundations - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Position the FNZ partnership and redesign in adviser friendly language.

flashcards.front: Edge Platform Architecture Foundations - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser insists Edge still runs overnight batches - walk through the live streaming proof points.

flashcards.front: Edge Platform Architecture Foundations - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Edge removes batch refresh and manual reporting bottlenecks advisers remember.

flashcards.front: Onboarding Clients on CFS Edge - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Map the onboarding workflow across individual, trust, and SMSF structures.

flashcards.front: Onboarding Clients on CFS Edge - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm entity type, residency, and adviser authority before collecting documents.

flashcards.front: Onboarding Clients on CFS Edge - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Trust deed is missing or outdated - advise on uploading a certified copy before proceeding.

flashcards.front: Onboarding Clients on CFS Edge - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Always lock down entity and authority data before diving into forms.

flashcards.front: Asset Transfers and IDPS In-Specie Strategy - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Describe how Edge handles internal, external, and IDPS in-specie transfers.

flashcards.front: Asset Transfers and IDPS In-Specie Strategy - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm the transfer category and originating platform or custodian.

flashcards.front: Asset Transfers and IDPS In-Specie Strategy - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: External provider is slow to respond - remind advisers of the 3-8 business day window and note the sending platform.

flashcards.front: Asset Transfers and IDPS In-Specie Strategy - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Always identify the transfer category before quoting timelines or tax outcomes.

flashcards.front: Transacting and Managing Accounts - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Demonstrate the trading workspace upgrades including tax lots and unrealised gain views.

flashcards.front: Transacting and Managing Accounts - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm account type, adviser authority, and available cash before placing trades.

flashcards.front: Transacting and Managing Accounts - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser cannot see pending orders - check the activity timeline filters and refresh cadence.

flashcards.front: Transacting and Managing Accounts - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Always verify cash availability and sweep behaviour before trade entry.

flashcards.front: Reporting and Analytics Deep Dive - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Show how to configure custom date ranges and on demand report exports.

flashcards.front: Reporting and Analytics Deep Dive - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Clarify the reporting outcome the adviser wants and the target audience.

flashcards.front: Reporting and Analytics Deep Dive - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser cannot see a client in the family group dashboard - confirm they have visibility permissions.

flashcards.front: Reporting and Analytics Deep Dive - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Custom ranges and look-through dashboards reduce manual spreadsheet work.

flashcards.front: Security, Access, and Authentication - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain the July 2025 authentication refresh and why the countdown timer was removed.

flashcards.front: Security, Access, and Authentication - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Verify caller identity and authority before discussing access changes.

flashcards.front: Security, Access, and Authentication - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser struggles with MFA codes - confirm device sync and offer back up methods.

flashcards.front: Security, Access, and Authentication - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Security resets require identity verification before any change is made.

flashcards.front: Superannuation and Pension Functionality - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain pension payment setup including minimum drawdowns and COR enforcement.

flashcards.front: Superannuation and Pension Functionality - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm COR status and pension objectives before making any changes.

flashcards.front: Superannuation and Pension Functionality - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: COR shows Pending - explain why payment changes are blocked until status is Met.

flashcards.front: Superannuation and Pension Functionality - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Condition of release is the gating factor for any pension adjustment.

flashcards.front: Insurance Product Enhancements - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Summarise the July 2025 insurance upgrades and transfer process improvements.

flashcards.front: Insurance Product Enhancements - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Identify the insurance request type and confirm policy ownership.

flashcards.front: Insurance Product Enhancements - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Occupation change triggers underwriting review - gather new declarations before escalating.

flashcards.front: Insurance Product Enhancements - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Consent consolidation simplifies adviser workflows but still needs full disclosure.

flashcards.front: Common Adviser and Client Queries - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Locate and personalise the top ten adviser response scripts.

flashcards.front: Common Adviser and Client Queries - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Listen for the query archetype before opening the relevant script.

flashcards.front: Common Adviser and Client Queries - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser interrupts the script - summarise their concern and jump to the relevant step.

flashcards.front: Common Adviser and Client Queries - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Scripts are a starting point that must be personalised to the caller.

flashcards.front: Agent Response to Complaints and Escalations - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Classify incidents using Severity 1 to 3 definitions and triggers.

flashcards.front: Agent Response to Complaints and Escalations - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Identify severity based on impact, breadth, and regulatory risk.

flashcards.front: Agent Response to Complaints and Escalations - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Caller demands executive escalation - follow the severity triggers before looping in leadership.

flashcards.front: Agent Response to Complaints and Escalations - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Severity levels dictate which stakeholders and channels become involved.

flashcards.front: Self-Service Promotion Strategy - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Identify the self-service tools most relevant to adviser personas.

flashcards.front: Self-Service Promotion Strategy - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Ask how the adviser currently accesses updates or submits requests.

flashcards.front: Self-Service Promotion Strategy - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser prefers email submissions - show how digital forms reduce rework.

flashcards.front: Self-Service Promotion Strategy - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Self-service promotion must be tailored to adviser workflows and benefits.

flashcards.front: Team Contacts and Escalation Matrix - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Identify the correct queue or squad for common escalation scenarios.

flashcards.front: Team Contacts and Escalation Matrix - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm severity and topic before selecting an escalation path.

flashcards.front: Team Contacts and Escalation Matrix - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Multiple teams need to engage - clarify ownership and sequencing up front.

flashcards.front: Team Contacts and Escalation Matrix - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Using the matrix correctly keeps critical incidents on track.

flashcards.front: Handling Difficult Calls and De-Escalation - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Recognise emotional cues and apply the acknowledgement script.

flashcards.front: Handling Difficult Calls and De-Escalation - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Let the caller finish, acknowledge their emotion, and avoid premature solutions.

flashcards.front: Handling Difficult Calls and De-Escalation - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Caller continues to vent - loop back to acknowledgement and reframe gently.

flashcards.front: Handling Difficult Calls and De-Escalation - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Acknowledgement and reframing are the foundation for productive calls.

flashcards.front: Quality Assurance and Performance Monitoring - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Describe the QA rubric dimensions and scoring scale.

flashcards.front: Quality Assurance and Performance Monitoring - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Review recent QA scores before conducting coaching or calibration.

flashcards.front: Quality Assurance and Performance Monitoring - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Agent disagrees with a QA score - walk through evidence and invite reflection.

flashcards.front: Quality Assurance and Performance Monitoring - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: QA highlights both compliance and customer experience behaviours.

flashcards.front: Regulatory and Compliance Landscape - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Summarise key regulatory changes impacting Edge workflows in 2025.

flashcards.front: Regulatory and Compliance Landscape - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Verify adviser credentials and intent before sharing regulatory updates.

flashcards.front: Regulatory and Compliance Landscape - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser proposes bypassing AML checks - restate mandatory verification steps.

flashcards.front: Regulatory and Compliance Landscape - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Compliance conversations must be factual and supported with documented evidence.

flashcards.front: Ongoing Training and Enablement Calendar - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Describe the quarterly enablement themes and their target outcomes.

flashcards.front: Ongoing Training and Enablement Calendar - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Review the enablement calendar and identify sessions relevant to the caller.

flashcards.front: Ongoing Training and Enablement Calendar - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Session capacity fills quickly - offer waitlist options and recorded content.

flashcards.front: Ongoing Training and Enablement Calendar - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Tie training invitations to tangible adviser benefits or efficiencies.

flashcards.front: Feedback Loop and Continuous Improvement - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Describe the feedback intake channels and tagging structure.

flashcards.front: Feedback Loop and Continuous Improvement - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Log feedback with persona, impact, and urgency tags for prioritisation.

flashcards.front: Feedback Loop and Continuous Improvement - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Duplicate feedback across channels - consolidate entries to avoid over counting.

flashcards.front: Feedback Loop and Continuous Improvement - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Structured tagging ensures feedback reaches the right squads quickly.

flashcards.front: Additional Scenarios and Edge Cases - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Identify uncommon scenarios documented in the training guide and their owners.

flashcards.front: Additional Scenarios and Edge Cases - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Scan the scenario index to confirm ownership and severity alignment.

flashcards.front: Additional Scenarios and Edge Cases - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Unexpected outage outside business hours - engage the bridge and update the status page.

flashcards.front: Additional Scenarios and Edge Cases - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Scenario readiness starts with knowing where to find owners and playbooks.

flashcards.front: Communication Best Practices - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Structure communications using acknowledgement, clarity, and next steps.

flashcards.front: Communication Best Practices - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Identify the audience and desired outcome before crafting the message.

flashcards.front: Communication Best Practices - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser misreads urgency - restate the impact and critical timelines.

flashcards.front: Communication Best Practices - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: ACE keeps communications focused and empathetic.

flashcards.front: Final Checklists and Reference Tools - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Use the outbound call, transfer, and escalation checklists to drive consistency.

flashcards.front: Final Checklists and Reference Tools - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Open the relevant checklist before performing the task to confirm steps.

flashcards.front: Final Checklists and Reference Tools - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Checklist not updated after enhancements - note discrepancies for content owners.

flashcards.front: Final Checklists and Reference Tools - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Checklists, decision trees, and cheat sheets keep quality consistent.

flashcards.front: Streaming Telemetry and Platform Monitoring - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Describe the telemetry pipeline that replaced overnight batch monitoring.

flashcards.front: Streaming Telemetry and Platform Monitoring - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Open the platform health dashboard at the start of every shift.

flashcards.front: Streaming Telemetry and Platform Monitoring - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Telemetry spike but no adviser calls yet - alert the bridge lead to prepare communications.

flashcards.front: Streaming Telemetry and Platform Monitoring - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Streaming telemetry enables faster incident validation and response.

flashcards.front: API Integration Playbook - Objective focus
flashcards.back: List the major platforms with direct Edge API integrations.

flashcards.front: API Integration Playbook - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Identify the partner platform and integration objective.

flashcards.front: API Integration Playbook - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Adviser lacks API credentials - direct them to the digital request form.

flashcards.front: API Integration Playbook - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: API support begins with verifying partner and credential readiness.

flashcards.front: Digital Identity Verification Essentials - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain how Edge verifies identity for individuals, trustees, and directors.

flashcards.front: Digital Identity Verification Essentials - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm entity type and required documents before starting the digital capture.

flashcards.front: Digital Identity Verification Essentials - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Document upload fails - confirm file size, format, and retry steps.

flashcards.front: Digital Identity Verification Essentials - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Digital identity steps vary by entity type, so confirm requirements early.

flashcards.front: Condition of Release Governance - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Define each condition of release status in the Edge interface.

flashcards.front: Condition of Release Governance - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Check the COR widget before processing any pension request.

flashcards.front: Condition of Release Governance - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: COR pending - outline what evidence is missing and pause changes until received.

flashcards.front: Condition of Release Governance - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: COR status governs every pension decision in Edge.

flashcards.front: Pension Adjustment Reviews - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Review year to date drawdowns against minimum thresholds before changes.

flashcards.front: Pension Adjustment Reviews - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Open the pension dashboard to confirm YTD, minimum, and COR status.

flashcards.front: Pension Adjustment Reviews - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Payment falls below minimum - advise on catch up plan before year end.

flashcards.front: Pension Adjustment Reviews - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Pension adjustments always start with COR status and YTD position.

flashcards.front: Managed Accounts Optimisation - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain the managed account rebalancing cadence and drift thresholds.

flashcards.front: Managed Accounts Optimisation - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Confirm portfolio type, objective, and current drift before recommending actions.

flashcards.front: Managed Accounts Optimisation - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Drift exceeds 10 percent - explain the automated rebalance trigger and timing.

flashcards.front: Managed Accounts Optimisation - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Managed accounts follow defined cadence and drift rules to protect investors.

flashcards.front: Insurance Claims Triage - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Outline the documentation required for insurance claims and escalations.

flashcards.front: Insurance Claims Triage - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Collect claim type, policy details, and supporting evidence from the adviser.

flashcards.front: Insurance Claims Triage - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Incomplete medical forms - advise on required details before submitting.

flashcards.front: Insurance Claims Triage - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Complete documentation is the fastest path to claim progression.

flashcards.front: Incident War Room Coordination - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Explain the roles of bridge lead, comms lead, and technical leads during incidents.

flashcards.front: Incident War Room Coordination - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Activate the incident bridge and assign roles within the first minutes.

flashcards.front: Incident War Room Coordination - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Multiple incidents compete for attention - prioritise based on severity and impact.

flashcards.front: Incident War Room Coordination - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: War room structure keeps incidents productive and transparent.

flashcards.front: Analytics Storytelling for Advisers - Objective focus
flashcards.back: Select the right dashboard or report to answer the adviser question.

flashcards.front: Analytics Storytelling for Advisers - Procedure anchor
flashcards.back: Clarify the audience and decision the adviser needs to make.

flashcards.front: Analytics Storytelling for Advisers - Edge case watch
flashcards.back: Data overload - focus on the metric that links directly to the adviser goal.

flashcards.front: Analytics Storytelling for Advisers - Essential takeaway
flashcards.back: Always anchor analytics to the decision the adviser must make.

glossary.definition: Investor Directed Portfolio Service enabling custodial investment platforms.
Movement of securities without selling and re-buying, preserving cost base.
ASX clearing system used for listed security transfers.
ATO approval required before super or pension payments commence.
Edge view exposing underlying holdings, sectors, and currency exposures.
Quarterly rebalance or when allocations drift beyond ±10%.
July 2025 upgrade allowing several advice documents in one consent request.
Mandatory employer contribution rate increasing to 12% from July 2025.
Critical outage or breach requiring immediate CTO and Service Desk escalation.
Self-service tool letting advisers customise column layouts and save views.

scenarios.title: Pension schedule change
scenarios.summary: Check COR status, adjust payment, confirm YTD vs minimum, document confirmation.

scenarios.title: IDPS in-specie transfer
scenarios.summary: Validate eligibility, send custodian request, quote 5-10 day settlement, monitor reconstruction.

scenarios.title: Outage with urgent trade
scenarios.summary: Acknowledge urgency, lodge manual trade, quote ETA, follow up within 15 minutes post-restoration.

scenarios.title: High-value incident bridge
scenarios.summary: Classify as Severity 2, involve the Relationship team, and confirm adviser update cadence.

decisionTrees.title: Escalation severity quick check
steps: Is platform-wide outage or breach? → Severity 1 → Service Desk + CTO (page 34).
Single adviser data issue? → Severity 2 → Service Desk + Data Migration (page 37).
Insurance-specific? → Route to insurance support within 48 hours (page 37).
Compliance or fee issue? → Compliance line (page 37).

decisionTrees.title: De-escalation coaching cues
steps: Acknowledge emotion → "I can hear how frustrating this is" (page 38).
Restate the issue neutrally before offering options (page 38).
Confirm next action owner and timeframe (page 40).
Check for agreement before closing the call (page 40).

thresholds: ATO pension minimum: 4% age 60-74, 5% age 75-79, 6% age 80-84, 10% age 85+ (page 22).
Managed account rebalance: quarterly schedule or ±10% drift (page 14).
Wholesale term deposit minimum $10k, maximum $500k per term (page 16).

do: Do confirm COR before altering pension payments (page 23).
Do document transfer request IDs and custodian contacts (page 9).
Do suggest self-service tools like Table Editor to reduce repeat queries (page 35).
Do send wrap-up emails with actions and review times for Severity 2 cases (page 40).
Do involve the Relationship team when incidents affect high-value family groups (page 37).
dont: Don't promise performance reconstruction completion without checking SLA (page 10).
Don't bypass security incident resets; escalate to compliance (page 44).
Don't send consolidated family reports without verifying visibility permissions (page 18).
Don't delay notifying Compliance when calls reference regulatory obligations (page 41).

escalationTriggers: Platform outage or login failure affecting >5 users (Severity 1) (page 38).
Pension payment requested with COR Pending (page 23).
Insurance claim denial due to occupation change requiring specialist review (page 28).
Data migration exceeding published SLA for high-value accounts (page 10).
Repeated complaints referencing advice obligations or regulatory breaches (page 41).
